name: Cards'N'Coins
description:
A Card game themed around pirates! Defeat the enemy AI and try to collect as many cards as you can! 

The Card rewards after beating an enemy is random, meaning you'd have to beat the same enemy more than once if you want all the cards, however with each victory the fight also becomes easier as you will be able to add those cards to your deck! 

Most of the cards come with a special effect as well!

Be careful however as your cards can only be placed down on the board if there's a space with sufficient coins, meaning you have to plan your deck carefully!

During your battles, know that there's a frontline and backline, so be careful of where you place your cards!

(This was made for a project and as such it will most likely NOT receive updates)
